Class GameUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.GameUtils

  • public class GameUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A utilities class to store common code to be used through the application.
    Version:
    1.0 9/19/2014
    Author:
    Andrew Zurn

      static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode callGameWebservice(java.lang.String searchTerm)

      Given a cookie, will look for the value 'voted', and will return false if found (cannot vote), otherwise will return true (can vote).

      • callGameWebservice

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode callGameWebservice(java.lang.String searchTerm)
        Call the Microsoft webservice with a given searchTerm, which will return a list of found games matching the criteria in a Json format.
        Parameters:
        searchTerm - the game to be searched for
        Returns:
        the results of the search

      • parseGameInfo

        public static java.util.List<Game> parseGameInfo(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode gamesAsJson)
        Parse a list of games returned from the webservice, return a list of games.
        Parameters:
        gamesAsJson - the json that was returned from the webservice
        Returns:
        the list of games.

      • canVoteOrAdd

        public static boolean canVoteOrAdd(play.mvc.Http.Cookie cookie)
        Given a cookie, will look for the value 'voted', and will return false if found (cannot vote), otherwise will return true (can vote).
        Parameters:
        cookie - the gameon_vote cookie
        Returns:
        false if found and value is voted, else true

      • isWeekend

        public static boolean isWeekend()
        Will return true if it is a Saturday or Sunday, else false.
        Returns:
        true if a day in the weekend, otherwise false.

      • timeToMidnight

        public static java.lang.Integer timeToMidnight()
        Will return the time in seconds to midnight
        Returns:
        integer holding value of seconds to midnight

      • isJsonEmpty

        public static boolean isJsonEmpty(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode gameAsJson)
        Will look to see how many entries were returned in our json response, and if total entries is 0, will return true, else it will return false.
        Parameters:
        gameAsJson - the json response from the webservice.
        Returns:
        true if it is empty, otherwise false.
